Location: R. Mte. Cardoso 12-14, 3090, Portugal
Name: Costa De Lavos Service area
Description: Service area with toilets, showers, (only during the season) water and place to dispose the gray water. Right on the beach. Nice village to see, Casa dos Pescadores to be visited.

Location: Azinhaga do Casal das Oliveiras, 1500 Lisboa, Portugal
Name: Camping Lisboa
Description: huge huge place in the hills outside the city. lots of trees and grass. lower flat section for rigs w/hookups, steeper hillside in the forest for tents or vans. room for 1800 so mileage may vary noise-wise. facilities cleanish and showers hot. bar cafe minimarket wifi

Location: R. do Pinhal 2, 8200-593 Albufeira, Portugal
Name: Algarve Motorhome Park
Description: Nice "camping" for motor homes and camper vans. There are warm showers for .50 euros for 5 minutes but no bathrooms. Must be self contained. Well laid out flat gravel parkings and some spots with shade. Electricity, water and dump station; washing machines 4.50 euros per load.  5 minutes from a very nice beach. 9 euro with electricity for 2 people and camper; price goes down if stay more nights.

Location: Av. dos Pescadores, 4920 Vila Nova de Cerveira, Portugal
Name: Vila Nova Da Cerveira
Description: A nice service area closed to Rio Minho, very close to the city and nice tapas and restaurants. Water and black water discharge available. Toilets might be available during the season.

Location: EM1265 5A, 8650-421 Vila do Bpo., Portugal
Name: Camping Ingrina
Description: Rural camping for €6.50 per person. A little rough and ready but friendly people and lovely walks to Ingrina and Barranco beaches. If you're looking for a modern campsites with lots of facilities and activities then this is not for you.

Location: R. Cabeço, 3450, Portugal
Name: Braga camping municipal
Description:
Small clean campsite 14.80 € for 2 pers cc electric and wi fi 

Petit camping propre 14.80€ pour 2 pers + cc electricite et wi fi

Location: N246, 7320, Portugal
Name: Quinta do Pomarinho
Description:
On the road 246 Castel da Vide in Portealegre. Small campsite managed by a Dutch person. Toilet, hot water, calm, electricity. Outdoor BBQ 
.....
Sur la route 246 Castel da Vide à Portealegre petit camping gère par un hollandais WC eau chaude électricité
 calme. cuisine extérieure BBQ

Location: N398 801T, 8700 Moncarapacho, Portugal
Name: Moncarapacho
Description: Camping beautiful flat surface flat about home friendly nice good WiFi 11.70 € CC 2 persons electricity place delimited

Location: N125 320Z, 8600 Luz, Portugal
Name: Turiscampo camping bungalow park
Description: Very good campsite. Outdoor pool, indoor pool, restaurant, bar and spa. Pitches are big.

Location: Via Dorsal de Armação de Pêra, 8365 Armação de Pêra, Portugal
Name: Praia de Armacao de Pera Camping
Description: Big camp place in the middle of town.  Really good price!!!

Location: R. Cunha 207-295, 4430-812 Avintes, Portugal
Name: Parque Biologico Gaia
Description: 7 motorhome simple pitches with 8,4mx4,0m (€4/night) and 2 double pitches (€6/night) w/ 15,6mx4,0m, electric hookups. Plus each adult €4, each child €2. Cars only €2. Pets only by leash. 10 kms away from Underground in Republica Avenue in Gaia. Phone +351 227 878 120. All bookings by e-mail : atendimento@parquebiologico.pt. You can download the digital leaflet on the website www.parquebiologico.pt

Location: N109, 3090-380 Figueira da Foz, Portugal
Name: Orbitur Camping
Description: Large site with direct beach access. Very clean facilities. Wifi only at the bar.

Location: Unnamed Road, 4970, Portugal
Name: Camping Travanca
Description: Camping Travanca, National Park Peneda-Gerês

Location: Parque de Campismo Municipal da Fuseta, Rua Coronel Brandeiro, Fuseta, Moncarapacho e Fuseta, Olhão, Faro, 8700-016, Portugal
Name: Campismo Fuseta
Description:
Rustic Municipal site, but clean & friendly. Mainly touring Motorhomes & caravans /tents, with just a few permanent. Stone pitches under mature trees, varying shade. Shower & washing facilities basic, but being updated (Oct 16). 
Part of the Ria Formosa nature reserve with fabulous beaches & islands nearby, reachable by ferry (except low season) and water taxi. Fuseta isn't touristy, but has plenty of cafés & fish restaurants. 
Secure enough to consider leaving your unit here to fly home from Faro Airport, reachable by train/bus or taxi.

Location: Unnamed Road, 4960-170, Portugal
Name: Camping Lamas de Mouro
Description: Mountain Camping, with trekking, 4x4 and canyoning  guides

Location: EN 103-7, Reconco, Sé, Santa Maria e Meixedo, Bragança, 5300-440, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo Baranca
Description: Campground with good facilities and very good internet. Open all year. Friendly owner. With own river.

Location: Ermida, Vilar da Veiga, Terras de Bouro, Braga, 4850-214, Portugal
Name: Ermida Geres Camping, Ermida
Description: Nice little camping. Family run. Open all year (it's Christmas Day today and it rains cats and dogs). Small restaurant/bar. Good wifi. Hot shower.

Location: Parque de Campismo Baía Azul, Avenida Marginal, Casal das Hortas, São Martinho do Porto, Alcobaça, Leiria, 2460, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo Baia Azul, San Matinho do Porto
Description: Nice and cheap campground. Helpful staff, clean facilities incl laundry. Very good location just outside the village, nice beach across the street. EUR 9 for 2 incl elec in offseason. Open allyear.

Location: Peniche Praia, Estrada Marginal Norte, Peniche, Leiria, 2520-237, Portugal
Name: Camping Peniche Praia, Peniche
Description: The place went through a lot of construction work and most of it is finished. So everything is pretty new, clean, well organized and the staff is very friendly. We enjoyed our stay here (Old text: Old and unorganised 2star camping. The location at the cliff is less nice than expected. But really good hot shower! Ok for an overnight. Open all year.)

Location: Parque de Campismo Zambujeira, EN 393-1, São Teotónio, Odemira, Beja, 7630-777, Portugal
Name: Camping Zambujeira do Mar
Description: Nice little camping under eucalyptus trees. Good and clean infrastructure, very well mentained, even warm water to wash dishes. Bar open till late, small shop. Open all year.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Sagres, Rua do Poço, Sagres, Vila do Bispo, Faro, 8650-375, Portugal
Name: Camping Orbiture, Sagres
Description: Nice campground with good facilities. A bit outside of Sagres but nice view over the town. Restaurant/Bar open till 9pm. Bread can be ordered at reception. Open all year. Around 16 EUR for 2 incl. elec.

Location: Parque Rural de Autocaravanas Vale da Carrasqueira, EN 266;ER 266, Montinho, Monchique, Faro, 8550-245, Portugal
Name: Vale da Carrasqueira, Monchique
Description: Very nice trailer park with toilett, shower, good wifi and little pool. EUR 12.50 incl power. Popular among the huge white ships, but anyway recomendable.

Location: Évora Camping, Ciclovia N380, Vila Lusitano, Horta das Figueiras, Malagueira e Horta das Figueiras, Évora, 7005-840, Portugal
Name: Orbitur Camping Évora
Description:
Camping with all facilities. Outside of the city. EUR 16.60 for 2 incl. elec. Ok, but nothing special. 

follow the signs to the Campground. the Garmin way is wrong.

Location: Parque de Campismo, Rua da Escola, Areeiro, Santo António dos Olivais, Coimbra, 3030-481, Portugal
Name: coimbra Campground
Description:
Safe place and super confortable.
shower,water,electricity,huge barbecue areas,and only 10€ per tent and motorbike

Location: Parque Campismo Municipal de Serpa, Rua Francisco Torrão, Bairro Municipal, Serpa, Serpa (Salvador e Santa Maria), Serpa, Beja, 7830-420, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo Municipal
Description: big campsite,  good and clean ablutions,  Wifi is fast  at the reception area, many trees, nice staff,e paid 10,60€ for 2 persons, a mobilehomes and electricity.

Location: R. Nossa Sra. da Vitória, 2445 Pataias, Portugal
Name: Quinta da Falca RV park
Description:
Private restaurant RV park. Beach access.

Camper (24H) + Water + Dump station = 10 Euros

Location: Ecoparque do Outão, Rua Orlando Curto, Setúbal (São Julião, Nossa Senhora da Anunciada e Santa Maria da Graça), Setúbal, 2900-182, Portugal
Name: Ecoparque do Outão
Description: Nice clean campsite along the bay. Clean hot showers. Very friendly staff and guards. Dogs welcome. 9,40 for 1 minivan up to 6 persons.

Location: Camping Milfontes, Rua dos Bombeiros, Vila Nova de Milfontes, Odemira, Beja, 7645-296, Portugal
Name: Vila Nova de Milfontes
Description: Complete and nice camping with swimming pool, hot showers, restaurant and 800 meters of sea.

Location: Valhelhas Camping, EN 232, Quinta do Cabecinho, Valhelhas, Guarda, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo Rossio de Valhelhas
Description:
Joli camping au bord du rio Zezere avec une petite plage fluviale attenante. Ombragé, station d'eau et de vidange pour camping-car, électricité possible, sanitaires propres, petit bar/restaurant. Ambiance familiale.

Nice campsite on the rio Zezere with a small adjoining river beach. Shaded, water and dumping station for camper, electricity at site, clean toilets, small bar / restaurant. Family atmosphere.

Location: Camping Alentejo, EN 18, Bairro Mourique, Vimieiro, Arraiolos, Évora, 7100-300, Portugal
Name: Camping Alentejo
Description:
Agréable camping à quelques kilomètres d'Evora. Petite piscine. Sanitaires magnifiques. Peu d'ombre. Route proche très passante même de nuit. Dommage. Wifi.

Pleasant campsite a few kilometers from Evora. Small pool. Beautiful sanitary . Little shade. Close road very busy even at night. Wifi on site.

Location: Parque de Campismo do Sindicato dos Bancários do Sul e Ilhas - Olhão, Ecovia do Litoral, Quelfes, Olhão, Faro, 8700-278, Portugal
Name: Parque De Campismo E Caravanismo Do Sindicato Dos Bancários Do Sul E Ilhas Olhao
Description: Superbe camping sous les pins. Grande piscine à payer en supplément. Sanitaires propres et en grand nombre. Eau potable et vidange. Electricité possible.

Location: Estádio Municipal de Tomar, Rua Horta do Barão, Santa Maria dos Olivais, Tomar (São João Baptista) e Santa Maria dos Olivais, Tomar, Santarém, 2300-359, Portugal
Name: Parque Municipal de Campismo Tomar
Description:
Camping un peu vieillot mais proche du centre ville et de la grande piscine municipale. Sanitaires un peu ancien mais propre.

Camping a little bit old but close to the city center and the large municipal pool. Sanitary a bit old too but clean.

Location: Costa, Guimarães, Braga, 4810-148, Portugal
Name: Camping Penha Guimaraes
Description:
Camping sur la colline surplombant Guimaraes. Bondé en août lors du festival de Festas Gualterianas. Sanitaires insuffisants en nombre. Minuscule piscine. Joli cadre et jolie vue. Accès facile à Guimaraes en funiculaire.

Camping on the hill overlooking Guimaraes. Crowded in August at the festival of Festas Gualterianas. Sanitary insufficient in number. Tiny pool. Nice setting and nice view. Easy access to Guimaraes by funicular.

Location: Camping Ria Formosa - Cabanas de Tavira, Rua Rui Calvino, Cascalhão, Conceição e Cabanas de Tavira, Tavira, Faro, 8800-077, Portugal
Name: Ria Formosa camping site - Conceição Cabanas Tavira
Description: First class site with all amenities incl laundry , pool restaurant - all well run !

Location: Douro Camping, Rue de l Parque de Campismo, Miranda de L Douro, Miranda do Douro, Bragança, 5210-212, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo
Description: Lovely campsite at the border with Spain. Very clean with excellent facilities. 3 euros per person plus 4 euros for small camper. Electric extra.

Location: Camping Orbitur Foz do Arelho, Rua Maldonado Freitas, Foz do Arelho, Caldas da Rainha, Leiria, 2500-513, Portugal
Name: Parque de campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho
Description: Big campground that's open all year. Services like TV room or swimming pool are closed during the winter.

Location: Ecoparque do Outão, Rua Orlando Curto, Setúbal (São Julião, Nossa Senhora da Anunciada e Santa Maria da Graça), Setúbal, 2900-182, Portugal
Name: eco campismo de setubal
Description: wonderful.dirct at the sado river.real hot showers.for me one of most relaxing places in sothern europe.great.euro6.-

Location: Parque de Campismo de Alcácer do Sal, Rua da Fonte da Talha, Bairro das Majapoas, Alcácer do Sal, Alcácer do Sal (Santa Maria do Castelo e Santiago) e Santa Susana, Alcácer do Sal, Setúbal, 7580-057, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo de Alcácer do Sal
Description: Nice little campground in Alcacer do Sol. €8.90 for two of and a tent on our bicycles. Pitches are large and shaded and have hedges for privacy. Showers are hot and clean. Toilets are BYO toilet paper. A good spot to spend the night. Grocery store next door and Lidl across the road.

Location: Toca da Raposa, EM 504, Meruge, Oliveira do Hospital, Coimbra, 6270-605, Portugal
Name: Toca Da Raposa
Description:
Very pleasant campsite with good facilities, swimming pool, bar and an atmospheric restaurant (sitting inside or on the patio) The owner and staff are very friendly and helpful. 
There are few friendly dogs and cats (and guinea pigs!) on the campground but as far as we know your pet is welcome and apparently the resident dogs are quite chilled out and friendly with camping doggies.
When you come and stay here, make sure there's a Wednesday night for you to enjoy and experience the best (authentic) pizza dish! Baked by a fabulous Italian/Belgian couple using their home grown organic ingredients and baked in the outside wood-fired pizza oven. An absolute must and very pleasant experience! (these Wednesday Pizza night are only at season time from Easter - October) And of course there's no pizza without a nice bottle of cold beer (good selection of Belgian and Portuguese beers)
You can just turn up or call ahead: (+351)238601547 or (+351)926704218

Location: Parque de Campismo Rural da Ingrina, Caminho Agrícola da Funcheira, Vila do Bispo e Raposeira, Vila do Bispo, Faro, 8650-281, Portugal
Name: Tourbus compartment at Ingrina Campsite
Description:
Tourbus compartment or sleeping berth at campsite Ingrina near Vila do Bispo in the nature reserve.

I was here with my motorbike in May (Touring cbf 600) looking for a safe base for my luggage and my bike. It was perfect. Motorcycle parked next to bus. I stayed 3 weeks.
Had a compartment in the upper flor of "Roman's Tourbus" (ask at the gate of the Camping vor check air bnb). 1night / ~ 14, - € (depends how you book/stay) . Use of all facilities of Ingrina Camping (older campsite but its clean and  uncomplicated, reliable hot showers when I was here!). At night starry sky and Milky Way through open roof hatch in the 2-beds-compartment :-) 

  I left my havy luggage in the bus and I made several motorcycle tours through the West Algarve, Monchique Mountains and visited several beaches (often unpaved roads). 
Very quiet, in the middle of nature - beautifull beaches also on foot accessible. Roman is a friendly and helpful host.
(Pictures of bus and view from the restaurant terrace towards the Ingrina-Beach)

Location: Parque de Campismo de Castelo Branco, EN 18, Castelo Branco, 6000-773, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campo Municipal
Description:
Established Campsite
Big campsite, hardly any people in June. English speaking and very friendly in reception. 
Spotless toilet block.
Some of the lowest prices in europe. Cost €5.75 for one person, a car and a tent. No other facilities and ideally need transport back up the road to town.

Location: Camping Rio Côa, EN 16, Leomil, Mido, Senouras e Aldeia Nova, Almeida, Guarda, Portugal
Name: Café Rio Coa
Description: Very nice campsite right next to the river. Friendly and helpful owner! Possibility to rent a canoe for small money, take a beer or coffee in the café or just step out of your car/tent in the morning and take a bath in the clear water. Perfect place to stay!

Location: Parque do Pião, EN 339, Covilhã e Canhoso, Covilhã, Castelo Branco, 6200-073, Portugal
Name: Camping Pião
Description: Nice camping, right near "Serra da Estrela", the highest mountain in Portugal.

Location: Góis Camping, Ponte Real, São Paulo, Góis, Coimbra, 3330-304, Portugal
Name: Goiscamp
Description: A nice camp with some amenities right next to the center of the village. It has a river with sand where you can bath. Just great!

Location: Campingbeijames, EM 1023, Portela, Vale da Amoreira, Manteigas, Guarda, Portugal
Name: Rural
Description: Basic camp site  with warm shower and toilets. The gate is closed but you can open it yourself . There are two frendly dogs - they guide you to the site.

Location: Casa do Sardão - Albergue, 769, Avenida do Paço, Carreço, Viana do Castelo, 4900-012, Portugal
Name: Albergue Casa do Sardão
Description:
Hostel with parking place.
You can use kitchen, showers and bathrooms, and all the common areas.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Mogadouro, Avenida Calouste Gulbenlkian, Mogadouro, Valverde, Vale de Porco e Vilar de Rei, Mogadouro, Bragança, 5200-233, Portugal
Name: Parque de campismo de Mogadouro
Description: Nice campsite, hot showers 11€ for 2 motorcycles and 1 tent. No restaurant but there’s a supermarket 2 kilometres away.

Location: Campimeco, CM 1043, Casal dos Cardosos, Sesimbra (Castelo), Sesimbra, Setúbal, 2970-103, Portugal
Name: Campimeco
Description:
This Campsite is found inside the beautiful region of Sesimbra, where there is a whole historical and fishing tradition. It is also near the beach “Praia das Bicas”, in the Meco Village, one of the most sought beaches on the western coast. People come here to practice several sports (surf, bodyboard) and also to find cliffs filled with fossils.
It possesses a total area of 220.000m2 (meters) and it is surrounded by an area of great natural beauty, between the green of the dense pine tree forests and the blue of the ocean. It is the perfect place for nature lovers to enjoy the tranquility of the countryside as well as the rebellion of the ocean.

Location: Alpedrinha, Fundão, Castelo Branco, 6230-069, Portugal
Name: alpedrinha farm
Description:
Superb quiet location, aloe vera farm, run by very friendly Dutch people. Arrive by the north and not by the small roads / paths of the south, because they are impassable for a cc but OK for van or 4x4. 10 € per night with sanitary and hot showers, 2.50 for electricity. About 80 locations only open for 12-18 months. Share

Superbe endroit au calme, ferme d'aloe vera, tenue par des Hollandais très sympathique. Arrivez par le nord et non pas par les petites routes/sentiers du sud, car elles sont impraticables pour un cc mais OK pour fourgonnette ou 4x4. 10€ la nuit avec sanitaire et douches chaudes, 2,50 pour l'électricité. Environ 80 emplacements seulement ouvert depuis 12-18 mois. Partagez

Location: Parque de Campismo da Albufeira do Maranhão, Caminho "Ilha do Náutico", Avis, Portalegre, 7480-122, Portugal
Name: Parque de campismo da Albufeira do Maranhão
Description: Nice place with camping, swimming pool, restaurant and boat rump. People can also park Camping cars outside.

Location: Salema Eco Camp, Rua 28 de Janeiro, Salema, Budens, Vila do Bispo, Faro, 8650-196, Portugal
Name: Surf & Nature Salema eco Camp
Description: Huge beautiful Camp site with hills and trees, showers, toilets, drinking water, electricity, a shop and a very good restaurant. Paid between 13,50 and 18 euros (price changed with a new month) a night for a tent, a motorbike and one person. Wifi only at the reception and the restaurant.

Location: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Idanha-a-Nova, EN 354-1, Idanha-a-Nova e Alcafozes, Idanha-a-Nova, Castelo Branco, 6060-192, Portugal
Name: Municipal campsite of Idanha-a-Nova
Description:
Has camping area, trailer area and bungalows. Big enough to have quite areas, within walking distance to a lake (dam reservoir) and has shades.
1 person + 1 tent + 1 motorcycle about 7.5€/night during high season.
[restaurant/bar/minimarket closed due to COVID]

Location: Princesa da Ria, Avenida Hintze Ribeiro, Torreira, Murtosa, Aveiro, 3870-331, Portugal
Name: Campismo Torreira
Description: Very basic campsite. Cheap prices (4€ per person and per tent).

Location: O Moinho Camping, EM 510-1, Bolo, Castanheira de Pera e Coentral, Castanheira de Pera, Leiria, 3280-009, Portugal
Name: camping o moinho
Description: Camping with green area. Hot shower between 18-23h. Very close to a river beach

Location: Parque de Campismo Quinta do Rebentão, 109, Rua do Freixo, Quinta do Rebentão, Vila Nova de Veiga, São Pedro de Agostém, Chaves, Vila Real, 5400-756, Portugal
Name: Quinta do Rebentão
Description:
August: 1 adult € 3.20; 1 small tent € 2.60; 1 motorcycle € 2.00.
Small cmapground, nice enough bathrooms and showers.
Swimming pool € 1.50 if you're staying at the camp.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Penacova, EN 2, Carvoeira, Riba de Baixo, Penacova, Coimbra, 3360-179, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo de Penacova
Description: Small, quiet cmapground by the river, mostly for frequent visitors. Good enough bathrooms. In september, 1 adult 5€, 1 small tent 4€, 1 motorcycle 4€.

Location: Camping Milfontes, Rua dos Bombeiros, Vila Nova de Milfontes, Odemira, Beja, 7645-296, Portugal
Name: Camping Milfontes
Description:
[beware that there are two campgrounds next to each other]

September, 1 adult € 4.55, 1 small tent € 5.40, 1 motorcycle € 3.30

Staff is bureaucratic as hell, campsite is yet another where people pay yearly to park their trailer. The bathrooms are actually quite good.

Some spots are sandy, nice for tents, not so nice for wheels.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Castelo do Bode, Castelo do Bode, São Pedro de Tomar, Abrantes, Santarém, 2200-638, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo de Castelo de Bode
Description: Depending where you come from you may or may not see indications on the road. Next to a river dam. Bathrooms are acceptable.

Location: Cepo Verde, EM 504, Gondesende, Bragança, 5300-561, Portugal
Name: Camping Cepo Verde
Description: Campground in the Montesinho Natural Park. Modern and clean Facilities, Restaurant and a nice Pool in a beautiful Landscape.

Location: Camping Serrão, EN 120, Aljezur, Faro, 8670-121, Portugal
Name: Camping Serrão
Description: Open all year. Large, ultra clean site will all amenities located 7 mins from Amoreira Beach or Aljezur. I am here during Covid and it’s very very quiet. Cost was €11 for one person, motor home and electric hook up.  there is a shop.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Monte Gordo, Aceiro do Parque de Campismo, Vila Real de Santo António, Faro, 8900-450, Portugal
Name: Monte Gordo Campsite
Description: This is an established camping ground. One minute from the beach.

Location: Parque de Autocaravanas da Muralha, Rua de Angola, Vila Real de Santo António, Faro, 8900-247, Portugal
Name: Riverside
Description: This a caravan park right by the river.

Location: Rua dos Vitoriosos 88A, Rua dos Vitoriosos, Galeotas, Azeitão (São Lourenço e São Simão), Setúbal, 2925-669, Portugal
Name: A Casa do Lago
Description:
Paulo and Natalia are the most hospitable and friendly people you can find in this part of Portugal! They are avid travellers themselves (converted an ambulance!) so they know exactly what a tired traveller needs. 

Amazing garden (Paulo is a professional gardener), two lovely dogs, plenty of space, dozens of travels stories and millions of tips where to go and what to do around the entire of Portugal. 

If you’re passing by this part of the country - make a stop at Paulo’s place. You can stay in your van or rent a room, take a hot shower or enjoy a bbq and cool garden shades. 

This is the place to relax, unwind and recharge your batteries (also literally your van batteries :D), before you continue your travels. 

Just visit here and thank me later!

Location: Parque de Campismo do Merujal, Rua do Parque de Campismo, Merujal, Urrô, Arouca, Aveiro, 4540-013, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo do Merujal
Description:
A very nice camping with everything you need to refeel your needs and keep going. Managed by locals and they made a very nice local dish.
Recomended!

Location: Montargil, EN 2, Pintadinho, Montargil, Ponte de Sor, Portalegre, 7425-133, Portugal
Name: Orbitur Montargil
Description: Good conditions, nice prices, accepted motorbikes

Location: ER 266, Nave Redonda, Saboia, Odemira, Beja, 7655-812, Portugal
Name: Isolated Paradise
Description:
I offer a few campervans and tents pitches in my isolated paradise. A change of scenery is guaranteed in an old farm of 20 hectares away from the eyes and the neighbors, all in the middle of nature! 

About 5 places are available for campervans. 

We are in the early stages of the project but it is possible to use water from a garden hose, to recharge your batteries and to use the wifi near my house for an additional cost. It is forbidden to dispose of waste water! 

The sites are located in a freshly cut oat field, it is possible to walk around, observe the fauna and flora, swim in a dam, or even have a picnic. Smoking is strictly prohibited in the fields due to the high risk of fires!

Prices: 

The price is 10€ per night or 2 hours of work in the morning. I need help to move fences and other simple work . 

5€ to fill your water tank max 60 liters, water is a rare commodity here, I advise you to fill your tank elsewhere if possible)
4€ for the batteries to charge in my garage
2€ for the wifi

Proceeds will be used to fund the reforestation of the estate, to implement a project based on the benefit of a healing sound place, and to build an eco-camp with dry toilets, showers and outdoor kitchens.

Location:
The location indicated is very close to the actual location. Send me a message before your arrival at +351 968 360 034 so that I can give you the best route. The road is narrow and in bad condition but accessible.

Do not hesitate to contact me for more information! 
-------

Je mets à disposition quelques emplacements campervans et tentes dans mon paradis isolé. Dépaysement assuré dans une ancienne ferme de 20 hectares à l’abri des regards et des voisins, le tout en pleine nature ! 

Environ 5 places disponibles pour campervan. L’autonomie totale est conseillée pour profiter du lieu au mieux.

Nous sommes aux prémices du projet mais il est possible d’utiliser de l’eau depuis un tuyau d’arrosage, de recharger vos batteries et d’utiliser le wifi près de chez moi pour un coût supplémentaire. Il est interdit d’éliminer ses eaux usées ! 

Les emplacements se situent dans un champ d’avoine fraîchement coupé, il est possible de se balader, d’observer la faune et la flore, de se baigner dans un barrage, ou encore de piqueniquer. Il est strictement interdit de fumer dans les champs à cause des risques élevés d’incendies !

Prix : 

Le prix est de 10€ la nuit ou de 2h de travail en matinée. J’ai besoin d’aide pour déplacer des barrières et d’autres travaux assez simples. 

5€ pour remplir votre réservoir d’eau max 60 litres, l’eau est une denrée rare par ici, je vous conseille de remplir votre réservoir ailleurs si possible)
4€ pour les batteries à charger dans mon garage
2€ pour le wifi

Les recettes serviront à financer la reforestation du domaine, à mettre en œuvre un projet basé sur le bienfait des fréquences vibratoires, et à construire un éco-camping avec toilettes sèches, douches et cuisines extérieures.

Localisation :
La localisation indiquée est très proche de la localisation réelle. Envoyez-moi un message avant votre arrivée au  +351 968 360 034 afin que je vous indique le meilleur itinéraire. La route est étroite et en mauvais état mais accessible.





N’hésitez pas à me contacter pour plus d’infos !

Location: Parque de Campismo de Vila Real, Rua Doutor Manuel Cardona, Quinta de São Pedro, Vila Real, 5000-558, Portugal
Name: Vila Rea Camping Site
Description: Municipal Camping Site of Vila Real, nearly swimming pool. The price for one person and one tent is about 6,45 Euros. Hot shower, electricity, water, and more. you can see in the website campingvilareal.com

Location: Rua de Santa Marinha, Mirandela, Bragança, 5370-347, Portugal
Name: Camping ground of Mirandela
Description: The campground of Mirandela is closed for COVID rules, but they have another caravan spot and you can use the parking lot there, no tents just caravans.

Location: Parque de Autocaravanas, Rua Miguel Torga, Sé, Santa Maria e Meixedo, Bragança, 5300-111, Portugal
Name: Tents and Campervan site
Description:
Bathroom and toilet in the campervan site near the Bragança castle.  
Tents are allowed for pilgrims of Camino de Santiago, If you have questions call the number 117, Car, campervan, motorhome, caravan only. They have lot of places around the castle, free controlled water and bathroom.  The water is available all the time but the bathroom I think just until 6 pm.

Location: Tareja, São Brás de Alportel, Faro, 8150-144, Portugal
Name: Motorhome Ecopark São Brás de Alportel
Description: Park for motorhomes, campers and caravans situated between the mountains and the sea, at a short driving distance from several beaches and towns like Faro, Loulé and Tavira (Algarve Portugal),surrounded by holm oaks, cork oaks and carob trees, and away from overcrowded tourist centres. Set in a 56 000 square meters of land. very good Wifi connection. Several restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Opening hours - 8.00, closing hours – 20.00 (winter) 21.30(summer). overnight stay- 7€; eletricity - 4€; Laundry - 4€; toilette - 1€ person /day; hot showers - 1€/5 minutes.

Location: CM 1203, Alcaria, São Brás de Alportel, Faro, 8150-101, Portugal
Name: Motorhome Ecopark São Brás de Alportel
Description: Park for motorhomes, campers and caravans situated between the mountains and the sea, at a short driving distance from several beaches and towns like Faro, Loulé and Tavira (Algarve Portugal),surrounded by holm oaks, cork oaks and carob trees, and away from overcrowded tourist centres. Set in a 56 000 square meters of land. very good Wifi connection. Several restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Opening hours - 8.00, closing hours – 20.00 (winter) 21.30(summer). overnight stay- 7€; eletricity - 4€; Laundry - 4€; toilette - 1€ person /day; hot showers - 1€/5 minutes.

Location: CM 1203, Alcaria, São Brás de Alportel, Faro, 8150-101, Portugal
Name: Motorhome Ecopark São Brás de Alportel
Description: Park for motorhomes, campers and caravans situated between the mountains and the sea, at a short driving distance from several beaches and towns like Faro, Loulé and Tavira (Algarve Portugal),surrounded by holm oaks, cork oaks and carob trees, and away from overcrowded tourist centres. Set in a 56 000 square meters of land. very good Wifi connection. Several restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Opening hours - 8.00, closing hours – 20.00 (winter) 21.30(summer). overnight stay- 7€; eletricity - 4€; Laundry - 4€; toilette - 1€ person /day; hot showers - 1€/5 minutes.

Location: Parque de Campismo da Trindade, Estrada da Ponta da Piedade, Torraltinha, Lagos, São Gonçalo de Lagos, Lagos, Faro, 8600-615, Portugal
Name: Camping Trinidade
Description: A campground for about 50 campers with a restaurant, toilet, shower, water, dump station, wifi. It’s not the cleanest campground but it does the job. There is a gate and the security is good. It costed us 14€ for one night with electricity. Wifi cost 3€ per day.

Location: Parque do Rio Silves, Percurso Pedonal Ribeirinho, Cerro de São Miguel, Silves, Faro, 8300-118, Portugal
Name: Parque do Rio Silves
Description: Secured parking for camper. No trees, no beach, no playground. Just a parking area with utilities. There is a gate and you must check-in before 18:00.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Albufeira, Rua Reynaldo dos Santos, Urbanização Quinta dos Caliços, Albufeira, Albufeira e Olhos de Água, Albufeira, Faro, 8200-004, Portugal
Name: Albufeira campground
Description: Huge campground with all the commodities that you could imagine. It cost us 13€ for the van, two adults, electricity and wifi. There is a discount if you plan to stay for more than 30 days. There is also a bus stop near so you can take the local commute to go the Albufeira downtown or at the beach.

Location: Parque de Campismo Rural Os Anjos, Estrada da Senhora da Saúde, Nossa Senhora da Expectação, Campo Maior, Portalegre, 7370-150, Portugal
Name: Camping os Anjos
Description: A very nice smaller camp site run by a Dutch guy.  Everything is very clean and tidy. There are all of the facilities one might expect at a simple camp site.

Location: Markadia, ER 257, Bolarina, Vila Nova da Baronia, Alvito, Beja, 7900-371, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo Markadia
Description: This is a large camp site around the lake formed by the Odivelas dam. If you can get a good spot there are excellent views of the lake. The facilities are generally good (but no wifi!) however it is expensive. I paid €24 per night for a Defender with a roof top tent and without electricity (2021 prices). If the place were cheaper I'd give it a high recommendation.

Location: Parque de Campismo São Miguel, CM 1186, São Miguel, São Teotónio, Odemira, Beja, 8670-320, Portugal
Name: Camping São Miguel
Description: This is a good 4 star camp  site. The washroom facilities are excellent. There's shade under the high conifers. The ground is fairly sandy.

Location: Guincho, Passadiço das Dunas da Cresmina, Cresmina, Cascais e Estoril, Cascais, Lisbon, 2750-070, Portugal
Name: Camping Orbitur Cascais
Description: Nice place close to guincho beach, complete.  we paid 20 euros for two people and the motorhome

Location: Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo de Vieira de Leiria, Rua José Moreira, Vieira de Leiria, Marinha Grande, Leiria, 2430-776, Portugal
Name: Campervan Park - Vieira de Leiria
Description:
Private park.
At this early stage with the conditions described.
More information by phone - 965370199
--
Parque privado.
Nesta fase inicial com as condições descritas.
Mais informações por via telefónica - 965370199

Location: São Pedro de Tomar, Tomar, Santarém, 2200–638, Portugal
Name: Quinta das Lameiras
Description: Our simple organic farm (Blue House, 60) is located 10 km from the Templar city of Tomar and 3 km from the Castelo de Bode dam. Ideal for visiting the town of Tomar and the Convento do Cristo. We have enough space for mobile homes, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom, electricity and drinking water, we look forward to welcoming you. Do not hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We sell products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cream cheese, cottage cheese, oil and duck, lamb, chicken and turkey. Each family can pay for what they want or can help preserve and improve the space. Being happy is the most important! Please contact us before you come. Our backyard is the world!

Location: Peso da Régua e Godim, Peso da Régua, Vila Real, 5050-272, Portugal
Name: Unser the Bridge
Description: Ares from the City  for Camper, with water electricity for each van.

Location: Vilartão, Bouçoães, Valpaços, Vila Real, 5430-167, Portugal
Name: O Tempo
Description: Nice small site. Xavier is a very polite and helpful manager. We had a problem with our water pump. He fixed it without any charge. He said it a service for my guest. The facilities are clean everything without additional cost.

Location: Fundada, Vila de Rei, Castelo Branco, Portugal
Name: parque de campismo do Bostelim
Description:
Cheap campground by a river beach.
ita has hot water showers and electricity included, also has tables and benches along with BBQ and a sink.

Location: Parque de Campismo das Furnas, Avenida Doutor Manuel de Arriaga, Furnas, Povoação, Azores, 9675-059, Portugal
Name: Furnas Campsite
Description:
Sitecamp with hot shower, cafeteria, plenty of places to camp.

there is also BBQ

Location: Praça de Touros da Luz, Rua N, Luz, Mourão, Évora, 7240-100, Portugal
Name: Aldeia da luz campervan
Description: Free and official parking space with water and cleaning station. very close to the beach.

Location: Rasmalho, Portimão, Faro, 8500-827, Portugal
Name: Vale dos Guenos
Description: If you are ready with the enormous number of people on the Algarve-beaches, roads and city centre’s, consider this place for welcoming relaxing moments. It’s a former motorhome for bikers who had their celebrations. Now it is a bit primitive campsite ran trough a mother and her son. If you like shadow…there’s not a lot. Amenities…one toilet and one cold shower. Bar/restaurant…the son will serve you drinks and custom made food if you like. So, it’s a bit alternative, but friendliness and the sound of nothing overrules everything! We paid 10,00 euros, they will charge you 2,50 extra if you need electricity.

Location: EN 125, Boliqueime, Loulé, Faro, 8100-087, Portugal
Name: Aire Cc  Coco Eric
Description:
Being created. It is an area intended for the reception of motorhomes & vans, quite exceptional in its design.
-----
En cours de création. C est une aire destinée à l accueil des camping-cars & vans tout à fait exceptionnelle dans sa conception.

Location: Jardim de Mikki, EN 125, Areias de Pera, Pera, Alcantarilha e Pêra, Silves, Faro, 8201-864, Portugal
Name: Mikki’s place to stay
Description:
Large campsite (150 spots) where semi-permanent and travellers mingle. Relaxed and free atmosphere. Price per night depends on size of plot. Small plot is €12 (without electricity) - €16 (with electricity) per night. €350 per month.
Swimming pool

Location: Câmara Municipal de Alcobaça, Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade, Bairro Hipólito, Casal Júlio Calhas, Alcobaça e Vestiaria, Alcobaça, Leiria, 2460-035, Portugal
Name: Camping Alcobaça
Description: Excellent free camping in the city centre, with electricity, water and free toiletries. Green area, a few meters from shops, restaurants, world heritage sites. Quiet location, with space for 15 motorhomes and dozens of tents. It has a campervan dump area. It is about 10km from Nazare. Great spot!

Location: Parque de Campismo de Canelas, EN 269-1, Quinta dos Reis, Alcantarilha, Alcantarilha e Pêra, Silves, Faro, 8365-204, Portugal
Name: Camping Canelas
Description: Site has plenty of shade trees and a relaxed atmosphere, 60% are occupied on a all Yr basis. 3 pools restaraunt where you can have 2 meals and drinks for approx 20£, 2 persons in November 9£ per night. lovely quiet site.

Location: Parque de Campismo Rural Lapa dos Gaivões, CM 1158, Cova dos Defuntos, Hortas de Baixo, Esperança, Arronches, Portalegre, 7340-122, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo Rural Lapa dos Gaivões
Description:
very interesting place to go hiking and very close to Spain. 

Also very peaceful.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Monte Gordo, Aceiro do Parque de Campismo, Vila Real de Santo António, Faro, 8900-450, Portugal
Name: Monte Gordo
Description: Municipal camp site close to town and across road from beach. A large site with plenty of shaded areas. Facilities are basic but plentiful. A mixture of permanent pitches and campsites.

Location: Parque de Campismo Monte Carvalhal da Rocha, CV1-11, Brejão, São Teotónio, Odemira, Beja, 7630-777, Portugal
Name: Monte Carvalhal da Rocha
Description: Established campground with bungalows, tent and vehicle pitches. Level terraces with plenty of trees for shade. Clean toilet and shower block with plenty of hot water. Swimming pool looks amazing but too cold to use in January. Open but reception not staffed when we visited so just parked up and paid later. €12 for 2 adults and 5m vehicle. Bargain. Few hundred metres from beach and amazing cliff top walk. Ostriches, zebras, bison, alpacas and other animals next door.

Location: Parque Campismo Santa Cruz, Avenida Joaquim Agostinho, Casal dos Feros, A dos Cunhados e Maceira, Torres Vedras, Lisbon, 2560-042, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo
Description:
Campground with good structure to stay for a period or per night.
Bathroom and hot showers, clean and well mantained.

Paid $7.5 per van, 4.5 per person, 0.71 to use power, $1.0 to complete water. (showers included on price).

Good amenities, safe, close to the beach.

Location: Camping Orbitur Valado, r, Variante da Nazaré, Pederneira, Nazaré, Leiria, 2450-148, Portugal
Name: Obitur Campground
Description:
Large campground with full facilities.   Mainly long term rental and cabins but several short stay sites.  €14:50 per night, 2 persons and campervan without hookups.
Frequent bus service to Navarre beach from campground entrance.

Location: Centro Náutico, EN 3, Praia do Ribatejo, Vila Nova da Barquinha, Santarém, 2260, Portugal
Name: RV Park
Description: This place also called Parque de Pernoita de Autocaravanas. You get water and get off grey/black water.

Location: Shamwari Hilltop Retreat, EM 507, São Martinho, Alcoutim e Pereiro, Alcoutim, Faro, 8970-064, Portugal
Name: Monte vascao, alcatim
Description: Currently a camper site.  But if you are nice, you can camp off track.  What is special is that the food here is extraordinary .  Almost worth a Michelin star.  Really great

Location: Parque de Campismo da Ilha de Faro, Avenida Nascente, Praia de Faro Nascente, Montenegro, Faro, 8005-520, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Faro
Description: Looks like a nice place. But not motorcycle friendly. You can park your car and motorhome inside but not a motorcycle. It needs to be parked on the street… so we didn’t stay here as it makes no sense for us.

Location: Aivados, Alcantarilha e Pêra, Silves, Faro, 8365-086, Portugal
Name: Rancho Belchior
Description: small campsite, 20 places maximum. Very well maintained sanitary facilities. Alternative furnishing . we paid € 10 for 2 people with jeep and roof tent

Location: Quinta do Rio - Nature camping, 1733, Rua da Lomba, Lomba, Pedravedra, São Cristóvão de Mondim de Basto, Mondim de Basto, Vila Real, 4890-140, Portugal
Name: Quinta do Rio Campsite
Description: A beautiful campsite by the riverside. Not much luxury, but all you need.  Follow the signs on the website.  If you want silence....... go here! A lot to do for a 4x4. The owner knows a lot about this area, also very interesting for mtb!

Location: Praia da Areia Branca, Lourinhã, Lourinhã e Atalaia, Lourinhã, Lisbon, 2530-254, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo da Praia da Areia Branca
Description: campground with some spaces for tents. really cheap with 5,12 Euro for 1 tent 1 person 1 motorcycle. many slots are blockt from permanently tents.

Location: Clube de Campismo de Lisboa, Estrada da Praia de Melides, Sancha, Melides, Grândola, Setúbal, 7570-713, Portugal
Name: Camping Melides
Description: Campground with hot shower's. Everything is clean and the beach is in walking distance. some restaurants are near by.

Location: 345-F, Via do Infante, Foupana, Moncarapacho e Fuseta, Olhão, Faro, 8700-073, Portugal
Name: between the orange trees
Description: Come and visit our Outbase in the South East of Portugal. Our 3.5 hectare site is full of fruit trees such as figs, olives, almonds, carob and of course orange trees. Our goal was to recreate a feeling of wild camping, which is why we didn't create fixed pitches - pick your own spot! After a wonderfully relaxing day or night, you can jump under the (warm) outdoor shower under the almond tree with us.... In short; very close to nature and back to basics. Please take into account check-in time between 5:00 PM and 8:00 PM :)

Location: Parque Municipal de Campismo de Espinho, Travessa da Rua 5, Espinho, Aveiro, 4500-182, Portugal
Name: Espinho Minicipal Camping
Description: Very basic but safe clean and friendly campsite, near a McD and Supermarket, 25min walk to train station to Porto, €9.50 per night for Land Rover

Location: R. 25 de Abril, Figueira, Beltroas, Mexilhoeira Grande, Portimão, Faro, 8500-130, Portugal
Name: CampingCar Figueira
Description: Motorhome Park with 30 places. Beautiful grounds, nice quiet area.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Braga, Avenida Doutor Viriato Amaral Nunes, São José de São Lázaro, Braga (São José de São Lázaro e São João do Souto), Braga, 4705, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo Municipal de Braga
Description:
Camping available for RV's, Tends, Caravan.
Located in the city center of Braga, with lots of interesting point of view, history, architecture

Location: EN 261-4, Monte da Rocha, Ourique, Beja, 7670-401, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo - Barragem Monte da Rocha
Description:
campsite with good facilities.  off season pretty empty. some trees. 
not expensive.

Location: Vila Nova de Erra, Coruche, Fajarda e Erra, Coruche, Santarém, Portugal
Name: Vila Nova de Erra
Description:
A new parking spot for Motorhomes (16 places), hard ground, each with electricity, water, facility for grey water, toilet cleaning.
3 Toilets, Showers, a common area with tables, seats, a kiosk, access barrier. Street illumination, quiet
No shade. A meeting point for bikers.
Quite new. Today no electricity, barrier open, kiosk closed.

Location: Covas e Vila Nova de Oliveirinha, Tábua, Coimbra, 3400-486, Portugal
Name: Quinta do Retiro
Description: Small campsite with natural pool, clean sanitary

Location: Camping Paredes de Vitória, Rua Mina do Azeiche, Mina, Pataias e Martingança, Alcobaça, Leiria, 2445-130, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo de Parades de Vitoria
Description: Large campsite with many long term/ permanent campers.  However, there is an area for short term travelers.  Close to the beaches and coastal towns.

Location: Parque de Campismo do Escaroupim, Rua Professora Júlia Albino Gomes Pimenta, Porto de Muge, Valada, Cartaxo, Santarém, 2070-503, Portugal
Name: Parque De Campismo Do Escaroupim
Description:
Mata Florestal, 2120-018 Salvaterra de Magos
campsite is very shady, in Pine tree forest, with Town of Marinhais close by

Location: Parque de Campismo Orbitur de São Jacinto, Quilómetro 20, EN 327, São Jacinto, Aveiro, Murtosa, Aveiro, 3800-901, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo
Description: Orbitur Campsite: tents,cabins,trailers. I  paid 10Eu for a tent and motorcycle. Good hot showers. You could set up your tent way in the back,very quiet, no table. Also looked like good places to wild camp on this road.

Location: Monte do Pé da Serra, ER 385, Sobral da Adiça, Vila Verde de Ficalho, Serpa, Beja, 7830-647, Portugal
Name: Quinta Pé-da-Serra
Description:
Quinta Pé-da-Serra" in beautiful Alentejo, Portugal.  

Wonderful van pitches and great campsites.  Outdoor kitchen and lounge are available and can be used at any time.  Sanitary containers with showers and toilets, laundry room with dryer and washing machine.  The farm in the heart of the Alentejo, on the Andalusian border, is very easy to reach, also for large campers and motorhomes.

Location: Estrada da Serrada, Urbanização de Santa Iria, Quinta da Serrada, Santa Maria, São Pedro e Sobral da Lagoa, Óbidos, Leiria, 2510-081, Portugal
Name: Municipal Aire (self contained only)
Description: Campervan parking area with designated lines between spots.  Free during the day. 2eu to just use services.  6eu overnight including services.  Someone comes around in the evening and checks licenses and leaves a ticket on your vehicle.  Leave money in the mail slot in the little shack by the services.  The services are only water, grey dumping and cassette dumping.  5G cell reception.  Very short walk into the historic centre with restaurants.  Two grocery stores in the opposite direction.  Very quiet night.

Location: Quinta de Odelouca, EN 267;ER 267, Estação de São Marcos, Alferce, São Marcos da Serra, Silves, Faro, 8375, Portugal
Name: Camping Quinta de Odelouca ADULTS ONLY
Description: Bert the owner has been here for 20 years and made us very welcome with our 2 motorbikes and small tent. Really beautiful location with superbly maintained facilities with delicious showers

Location: Camping Asseiceira, CM 1036-2, Relva da Asseiceira, Santo António das Areias, Marvão, Portalegre, 7330-257, Portugal
Name: Camping Asseiceira
Description:
Small rural campsite with a view of Marvao castle. It is run by a British guy. Good level pitches with lots of trees. Very clean facilities with 2 toilets and 2 showers for both women and men. Also separate washing area for dishes and clothes. Nice and quiet site.
Good tapas restaurant in nearby village.

Location: Parque de Campismo Ilha Pessegueiro, EM 554-1, Foros de Pouca Farinha, Porto Covo, Sines, Setúbal, 7520-421, Portugal
Name: Parque de Campismo da llha do Pessegueiro
Description: Lovely campsite with also available apartments, bungalows and seasonal rentals. Electric hook-up for a caravan with 2 adults was 20.50£ for the night. Lovely view of the sea from most sites. Bathrooms fine, VERY rustic (no toilet paper! bring your own). Shower also very bare minimum, but does the job. Check-in young man at reception was delightful, very friendly and spoke perfect English. No need for reservation - the place is huge, they will fit you in.

Location: Vilamoura Rustic Motorhome Aire, EN 125, Loulé (São Sebastião), Loulé, Faro, 8100-068, Portugal
Name: Rustic Vintage Camping
Description: "Family and friendly camping park, in the center of the Algarve. New park with a different decoration. 18 places available, with tables and chairs, spacious places with water and electricity. Wc - Showers - Wi-Fi - Enclosed area with surveillance - Pets accepted - Snack bar - Bar - Children's playground"

Location: Costa do Vizir Beach Village, Rua Jacinto Fernandes Bandeira, Porto Covo, Sines, Setúbal, 7520-437, Portugal
Name: Costa do Vizir Camping
Description: Quiet and simple place, with swimming  pool  , diferent camping alternatives, with restaurant  and a little market open from 9 to 12 om.

Location: PR13 Vereda do Fanal, Seixal, Porto Moniz, Madeira, 9270, Portugal
Name: camping fanal
Description: camping place in fanal. a lot of grass and flat areas to pitch the tent. you're camping next to the foggy forest of fanal. Free, but to camp there, you're suppose to request a camping permit prior to your trip.

Location: Parque de Campismo de Salgueiros, 263, Rua do Campismo, Canidelo, Valadares, Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, 4400-397, Portugal
Name: Parque Campismo Salgueiros
Description: Bad maintained campsite, but very cheap. Hot and clean showers and toilets but far outdated. But great to visit Porto. Uber works very well. We are here with a truck (15tonnes)

Location: Rua Bento Santos Costa, Costa, Guimarães, Braga, 4810-240, Portugal
Name: Parking para caravanas
Description: Motor home parking near to the town and safe.

Location: Avenida Marquês de Pombal, Bairro Novo do Condado, Morelena, Almargem do Bispo, Pêro Pinheiro e Montelavar, Sintra, Lisbon, 2715-125, Portugal
Name: 4WD Solitaire Lodge
Description:
Lodge with 4 suites, campsite for roof top tent cars, camper and, trucks. Workshop if need it for the travelers, small repairs.security 24 H.
Toilets available .little bar available. More than 70 parking places . Near city center of Sintra . Close to Lisbon city.
